statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -9 \\ 1 \\ 12 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 9 \\ 10 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -14 \\ -21 \\ -19 \\ -4 \\ -21 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
